fact-1.value: Our purpose is to partner with our OEM customers to develop technology and deliver innovative products which enable our customers to make greener vehicles that help keep our environment clean and make  our world a better place to live.We design and manufacture award-winning, industry-leading automotive fluid systems in a sustainable manner for OEMs across the globe, operating out  of 104 manufacturing locations  in 29 countries.
